description:
The TRAIN LIFE: A RAILWAY SIMULATOR Supporter Pack gives you access to 2 items you can use to decorate the conductor's cab: 
- The Dobry Smok, paying homage to the statue of a dragon  that has protected the ancient Polish capital for centuries 
- A handcar, doubtless the most efficient form of rail transport ever invented

A DLC for every player who wants to do a little bit more to support the game and our team!
name: Train Life - Supporter Pack
